entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom unhandled exception logging #50385
  • Unable to navigate to an action in controller from Razor component in Blazor Web app #50384
  • Debug in Blazor United App #50383
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #50382
  • Quarantine `ServerErrorNotificationTest.ShowsErrorNotification_OnError_Dismiss` and `ShowsErrorNotification_OnError_Reload` #50377
  • Improve perf of forms by caching lambda expression compilation #50376
  • [Blazor] Support resolving keyed services from DI #50374
    8.0-rc2
  • Needed guidance for a memory usage #50370
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook uses soon-to-be-obsolete Facebook Graph version v11 in .NET 6 #50366
  • Inconsistency between IIS and Kestrel for websocket connect operation with duplicate 'Upgrade: websocket, websocket' header #50364

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes #50283
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #50306
  • Blazor App encounters synchronous IO operation disallowed exception when outputting a lot of content #50319
  • SignalR Stateful Reconnect API #49977
    8.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Ignore read only properties in form mapping #49545
    8.0-rc2
  • Base Href Changing Or Normal Refresh #49931
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #50351

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50386
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Don't display the reconnection dialog after an error occurs #50381
    area-blazor
  • Fix corrupted streaming SSR output #50380
    area-blazor
  • Fix error message in CodeCheck file #50375
    area-infrastructure
  • Persist Prerendered State #50373
    area-blazor
  • Remove explicit UseRouting from templates #50372
    area-mvc
  • Use SDK with renamed Razor compiler DLLs #50369
    area-razor.compiler

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50281
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • Quarantine error notification tests #50378
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] Quarantine error notification tests #50379
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Update NavMenu.razor to use project name #50194
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Call AddMetrics inside AddRouting #50168
    blocked, area-networking, area-routing
  • Add IRateLimiterStatisticsFeature with default implementation and tests #46028
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2254265 #49575
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Delay component activation until the initial page loads completely #50345
    area-blazor
  • Make IEmailSender more customizable #50301
    area-identity
  • Update IdWeb 2.13.2 #50072
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50128
    area-networking
  • refactor : Remove unwanted area specific `editorconfig`. #50211
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Enable build acceleration #50205
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23407.2 #49911
    area-infrastructure
  • [SignalR] Error if multiple service attributes are on a single parameter #50248
    area-signalr, 8.0-rc2
